players.name: Alice
memory:

I am innocent and saw Charlie with a suspicious package last night. I suggest we investigate Diana."
Diana: "I saw Charlie with a suspicious package too, but I didn't see anything suspicious about Diana. We should investigate the package instead."

Bob: "I investigated Alice and found her to be the mafioso. I suggest we investigate the package Charlie was seen with last night, as it may hold clues to his murder."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
